alert.note: Alert for Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 9:23AM CST until January 15 at 1:00PM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 20 degrees. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 degrees. * WHERE...Inland Willacy and Inland Cameron Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 1 PM CST this afternoon. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 9 PM this evening to 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
